title: Virtual Assistant - Real Estate Agent Outreach & Relationship Manager
description:
Virtual Assistant - Real Estate Agent Outreach & Relationship Manager



Location: Remote (Philippines)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Salary Range: $4-7/hour USD (depending on experience)



ABOUT WEST CENTRAL AUCTION COMPANY



West Central Auction Company is a family-owned Missouri auction business with over 30 years of experience, operating from three locations (Harrisonville, Farmington, and Savannah). We specialize in real estate auctions with a revolutionary zero-commission model that helps property sellers achieve premium results in 30-60 days, compared to traditional timelines of 6–8 months.



Our Unique Model:

- Sellers pay ONLY capped marketing fees (typically $1,500)

- NO traditional 6% commission

- Buyers pay a 10% premium

- Properties sell faster with competitive bidding

- We're licensed Missouri real estate professionals and CAI Certified Auctioneers



Website: 

Owner:  J.T. - CAI Professional Auctioneer & Missouri Licensed Real Estate Agent



THE OPPORTUNITY



We've compiled comprehensive databases of 1,000+ Missouri real estate brokerages, agents, and companies. We need a skilled, professional Virtual Assistant to systematically contact these real estate professionals to:



1. Build relationships with Missouri real estate agents and brokers

2. Educate them about our auction model and how it solves their difficult listing problems

3. Schedule meetings between agents and our team

4. Generate referrals from agents who have properties that aren't selling traditionally

5. Create partnerships that are win-win for agents and their clients



YOUR PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES



Outreach & Communication (70% of role)

- Make 30-50 phone calls per day to real estate agents/brokers from our database

- Send 20-30 personalized
s daily to introduce West Central Auction

- Follow up with contacts via phone,
, and text message

- Respond to inquiries and questions about our auction process

- Handle objections professionally and educate about auction benefits



Meeting Coordination (15% of role)

- Schedule Zoom/phone meetings between interested agents and J.T.

- Send calendar invites and meeting confirmations

- Send meeting reminders 24 hours before scheduled calls

- Follow up after meetings to maintain 
ntum



Database Management (10% of role)

- Update contact status in our Google Sheets/CRM system

- Track all calls,
s, and interactions

- Document agent responses, objections, and interests

- Flag hot leads for immediate owner follow-up

- Maintain clean, organized records



Reporting & Strategy (5% of role)

- Provide daily activity reports (calls made,
s sent, meetings scheduled)

- Weekly summary of results and insights

- Share feedback from agents to improve messaging

- Suggest improvements to scripts and outreach strategies



REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS



Must-Have Skills:

- Excellent English - Fluent written and verbal communication (C1/C2 level)

- Phone Confidence - Comfortable making 30-50+ calls daily with a clear speaking voice

- Sales/Outreach Experience - Minimum 1 year in B2B sales, lead generation, or appointment setting

- Professional Communication - Can write clear, grammatically correct
s

- Organization - Meticulous with data entry and follow-up tracking

- Self-Starter - Works independently without constant supervision

- Reliable Internet - Stable connection for VoIP calls (required)

- Computer Skills - Proficient with Google Sheets, Gmail, Calendar, Zoom



Preferred Experience:

- Real estate industry knowledge (US market preferred)

- CRM experience (Salesforce, HubSpot, or similar)

- Previous work with US-based companies

- Experience in handling objections and consultative selling

- Virtual assistant or cold calling background



Key Personality Traits:

- Resilient - Can handle rejection and stay motivated

- Goal-oriented - Driven to hit daily/weekly targets

- Relationship-builder - Genuinely enjoys connecting with people

- Learner - Willing to understand the real estate and auction industry

- Proactive - Takes initiative to solve problems



WHAT YOUR DAY LOOKS LIKE:



Morning (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM Central Time)

- Review daily target list of agents to contact

- Make 15-20 outbound calls to Missouri real estate agents

- Send 10-15 personalized introduction
s

- Update database with call notes and outcomes



Afternoon (12:00 PM - 3:00 PM Central Time)

- Follow up with agents who requested information

- Send meeting confirmation
s

- Continue outbound calling (15-20 more calls)

- Respond to
 replies and questions



End of Day (3:00 PM - 5:00 PM Central Time)

- Update CRM/Google Sheets with all activity

- Schedule tomorrow's outreach targets

- Send a daily activity report to the owner

- Follow up on any hot leads or urgent items



Note: You must be available to work during US Central Time business hours (9 AM - 5 PM Central, which is 11 PM - 7 AM Philippine Time)



SUCCESS METRICS



You'll be evaluated on:



- Calls Made: 30-50+ quality conversations per day

-
s Sent: 20-30+ personalized
s per day

- Meetings Scheduled: 5-10 agent meetings per week

- Database Accuracy: 100% accurate contact updates

- Response Rate: Quality of follow-up and responsiveness

- Referrals Generated: Number of properties referred to us

- Relationship Quality: Positive feedback from agents contacted



SCRIPTS & TRAINING PROVIDED



We will provide you with:

- Proven call scripts for introducing West Central Auction

-
 templates for different scenarios (intro, follow-up, meeting invite)

- Objection handling guide - How to respond to common concerns

- Training videos about our auction process

- FAQ document answering technical questions about auctions

- Weekly coaching calls with a member of the team for continuous improvement

- Access to all company materials (website, case studies, testimonials)



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS



Base Salary: $4-7/hour USD (based on experience)



Performance Bonuses:

- $50 bonus for every 10 qualified meetings scheduled

- $100 bonus for each property listing we win through your referrals

- Monthly bonus for exceeding targets



Other Benefits:

- Paid training period (first 2 weeks)

- Potential for a raise after 90 days based on performance

- Long-term growth opportunity as we expand

- Work-from-home flexibility

- Supportive, entrepreneurial team environment



HOW TO APPLY



Please submit the following (all below steps are REQUIRED for application review):



1. Your Resume/CV - Highlighting relevant sales/outreach experience

2. Cover Letter answering these questions:

   - Why are you interested in working with a US real estate/auction company?

   - Describe your experience making outbound calls and setting appointments

   - What's your approach when someone says "I'm not interested" on a call?

   - How many calls per day have you made in previous roles?

   - What is your current internet speed? (run speedtest.net)

3. Voice Recording:

   - Record yourself reading this script: "Hi, this is [Your Name] calling from West Central Auction Company in Missouri. I'm reaching out to introduce our unique zero-commission auction service that helps real estate agents solve their toughest listing challenges. We help properties sell in 30-60 days that have been sitting on the market. Would you have 5 minutes to learn how we partner with agents like yourself?"

   - Upload to Google Drive or Dropbox and include the link

4. Sample
:

 - Write a brief
 you would send to a real estate agent introducing West Central Auction Company (based on the information above)

- Subject Line: "VA Application - Real Estate Outreach - [Your Name]"

- Send to: [Your
]



IMPORTANT NOTES

- This role requires working US Central Time hours (9 AM - 5 PM Central = 11 PM - 7 AM Manila Time)

- You MUST have a quiet workspace for making professional phone calls

- Stable internet is NON-NEGOTIABLE (minimum 10 Mbps download, 5 Mbps upload)

- This is a performance-based role - you must be comfortable with daily/weekly targets

- Training period is 2 weeks, then performance evaluation at 30, 60, and 90 days



IDEAL CANDIDATE PROFILE

You're perfect for this role if you:

- Love talking to people and building professional relationships

- Are motivated by targets and get satisfaction from hitting goals

- Can handle rejection without taking it personally

- Are organized and detail-oriented with follow-up

- Want to learn about the US real estate industry

- Thrive in an entrepreneurial, fast-paced environment

- Take pride in professional, polished communication

- Are looking for a long-term opportunity to grow with a company



This is NOT a good fit if you:

- Only want data entry work without client interaction

- Aren't comfortable making phone calls all day

- Need constant supervision and step-by-step direction

- Can't work US business hours

- Are looking for a short-term gig



QUESTIONS

If you have questions about this role, please include them in your application
. We review all applications within 48 hours.



We're looking to hire IMMEDIATELY for the right candidate!



West Central Auction Company is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and encourage all qualified candidates to apply.

title: Logistics Dispatch Officer 30-35k Based on Experience
description:
Logistics Dispatch Officer (Remote)

Employment Type: Full-time

About Luxo Living



Luxo Living is a leading Australian furniture and homewares retailer, delivering stylish and high-quality products to customers nationwide. Our logistics operations are critical to ensuring timely, accurate, and reliable deliveries across Australia.



About the Role



We are seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Logistics Dispatch Officer to join our team on a remote basis. This role is responsible for coordinating dispatch activities, liaising with courier partners, monitoring deliveries, and supporting delivery-related enquiries.



You will work closely with our warehouse, customer service team, and delivery partners to ensure orders are dispatched accurately and on time.

Strong attention to detail and organisational skills



Ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment



Clear and professional written and verbal communication skills

Strong problem-solving skills and a customer-focused mindset



Desirable (but not essential)

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8

 Ads or Google Ads

title: LEGAL ASSISTANT
description:
Are you detail-oriented, efficient, and looking to join a fast-paced legal environment?

We’re seeking a proactive and organized Legal Administrative Assistant to support a leading law firm specializing in insurance claims. This is a critical role focused on streamlining high-volume, repetitive tasks to ensure quick turnaround times and exceptional client service.



About the Role

This position is crucial for maintaining the firm’s competitive edge by ensuring quick turnaround times and efficient file management. The successful candidate will work closely with the client and their team to deliver outstanding support.



Key Responsibilities

- File Management: Open and manage ~20 new client files weekly. Input data into systems and generate documents such as opening letters, demand letters, and other legal correspondence.

- Ensure accuracy and timely completion (approx. 30 minutes per file).

- Follow-Ups and Task Management: Perform daily follow-ups on ~20-30 action items, including document requests, client communications, and task completions.

- Maintain an organized tracking system to update and manage action items efficiently.

- Court Document Filing: File documents on court databases as needed.

- Prepare legal documents based on provided templates and precedents.

-Administrative Support: Assist in issuing proceedings by entering data and managing case information.

-Provide additional administrative support to junior legal staff to allow them to focus on legal tasks.



Qualifications

-Attention to Detail: Strong focus on accuracy to handle repetitive, high-volume tasks.

-Efficiency: Ability to process tasks quickly while maintaining quality.

-Proactive and Independent: Willingness to learn and take ownership of tasks with minimal supervision over time.

-Adaptability: Open to expanding responsibilities as processes evolve.

-Familiarity with court filing systems or legal document management.



SALARY: PHP 45,000/Month



Apply through this link:

title: Helpdesk Support Agent (NetSuite & Salesforce Experience)
description:
Company Overview



LevelUp is a specialized BPO company that partners with technology companies across the US, UK, Europe, and Canada to provide tailored outsourcing solutions. For over seven years, we’ve built a reputation for delivering high-quality operational and back-office support, helping our clients scale efficiently. Our team consists of highly skilled and passionate professionals who are dedicated to providing exceptional service, technical expertise, and seamless support to our clients.



Position Overview



We are seeking a detail-oriented and customer-focused Helpdesk Support Agent to serve as the first line of support for internal teams, ensuring smooth operations related to sales processes and business applications. This role involves troubleshooting, managing system access, and escalating complex issues while maintaining thorough documentation for process improvements. The ideal candidate will have strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication abilities, and experience with help desk platforms, Slack, and admin tools. Training will be provided to ensure proficiency.



Key Responsibilities



•Provide guidance and troubleshooting support to internal teams on business applications usage.

•Manage system access requests and resolve issues via Slack, Zendesk, and admin tools.

•Escalate complex issues to relevant departments, such as Product Management, Order to Cash, Deal Desk, and Systems Engineering.

•Document and tag interactions to support process improvement and reporting.

•Collaborate with internal teams to ensure a seamless support experience.

•Stay updated with system changes and best practices through training and ongoing learning.



Qualifications



•Critical Requirement: Proven experience working extensively within Salesforce and NetSuite is essential for this role.

•2-3 years of live chat customer service experience

•Familiarity with sales processes and business applications.

•Proficiency with Zendesk, Slack, and admin tools for troubleshooting and issue resolution.

•Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

•Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.

•Ability to prioritize tasks and handle multiple issues efficiently.

•Experience in documenting and tagging support interactions for reporting and process optimization.



Nice to Haves

•Data & Analysis: Experience with SQL and/or BigQuery to support reporting, data

•Experience working in a SaaS, technology, or sales-driven environment.

•Familiarity with CRMs and order management systems.

•Familiarity with Jira for issue tracking and workflow management.

•Previous experience in an internal IT or business applications support role.

•Typing speed of at least 60 words per minute (WPM)



More Information:

•Fully remote work arrangement

•Shifting schedule

•Equipment provided

•HMO



APPLY HERE:

title: Meta and Google Ads Specialist (Remote Contractor)
description:
Job Overview

We are seeking a skilled and results-driven Meta and Google Ads Specialist to join our digital marketing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating, managing, and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across various platforms including Google Ads,
 Advertising,
 Ads, Bing Ads, and other SEM channels. This role requires a deep understanding of performance marketing, media buying, and analytics tools to drive conversions and maximize ROI. The successful applicant will play a key role in developing innovative strategies for e-commerce, affiliate marketing, and social media management to enhance brand visibility and sales.



Duties



Develop and execute comprehensive PPC campaigns across Google Ads,
 Advertising,
 Ads, Bing Ads, and other digital platforms.

Conduct detailed keyword research to identify high-performing keywords for targeted campaigns.

Manage media buying strategies and media planning to optimize ad spend efficiency.

Utilize SEO tools, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and web analytics to monitor campaign performance and identify opportunities for improvement.

Implement conversion optimization techniques to improve click-through rates (CTR) and conversion rates (CVR).

Perform A/B testing on ad creatives, landing pages, and targeting options to enhance campaign effectiveness.

Manage budgets effectively across multiple campaigns while maintaining strict adherence to client or company guidelines.

Generate detailed reports on campaign performance metrics and provide actionable insights for ongoing optimization.

Stay updated with the latest trends in digital marketing, SEM, SEO tools, and media buying strategies to ensure competitive advantage.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams including content creators and web developers to align advertising efforts with overall marketing goals.

Experience



Proven experience in performance marketing with a strong background in Google Ads (AdWords),
 Advertising,
 Ads, Bing Ads, and other paid social media platforms.

Demonstrated expertise in PPC campaign management with a focus on ROI-driven results.

Familiarity with SEO tools, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, DoubleClick, and web analytics platforms is highly desirable.

Experience in affiliate marketing, e-commerce advertising, media planning, and conversion optimization is preferred.

Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts including SEM, SEO strategies, media buying techniques, budgeting practices, and digital campaign analysis.

Ability to analyze data effectively to make informed decisions that improve campaign performance. This position offers an exciting opportunity for a motivated digital marketer to leverage their skills in a dynamic environment focused on innovative advertising solutions across multiple platforms.



Please send your application, including your portfolio and previous advertising campaigns, to: 



Dan Connor 

Marketing Director at ATG (Auction Technology Group) 

London, England, United Kingdom

title: Claims Officer (Work-from-Home)
description:
ABOUT US



We are a purpose-driven service company committed to assisting individuals through one of life’s most challenging times. At SuperCare, we believe that health and well-being should always come first. As a pioneering Australian company, we empower eligible individuals to access essential medical treatments by facilitating the early release of their Superannuation on compassionate grounds. For over a decade, we have been making a meaningful impact, helping thousands ease their financial burdens while prioritising their health.



With offices strategically located in Sydney and Canberra, we provide nationwide support to ensure our clients receive the care they need, wherever they are. As industry leader, we are committed to continuous innovation, delivering exceptional client experiences, and fostering a workplace culture that promotes professional growth and collaboration.



As we continue to grow, we are excited to invite an experienced and highly competent Claims Officer to help with our mission of transforming lives.







THE ROLE



The Claims Officer plays a pivotal role in ensuring client satisfaction and engagement. Responsible for managing a portfolio of assigned clients though each stage of the application process for the early release of Superannuation due to compassionate grounds. Ensure a seamless client experience through every touch point. Provide expert-level support to our clients, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and going above and beyond to exceed expectations.



As a dedicated consultant, serve as the primary contact in addressing all client inquiries and concerns. Take ownership and accountable for a sustainable high level of performance in critical areas of (1) Client Engagement and (2) Service Delivery.



Ensure that clients are achieving their desired outcome as well as maximum value from SuperCare services. Nurture a Culture of Trust & Accountability by serving as a role model in reinforcing SuperCare Core Values and ethical behavior.



Provide valuable insights into continuous improvement of the service offerings as well as the Client Experience.







Responsibilities:



Review support documents to ensure compliance with ATO guidelines



Schedule the lodgment



Lodge the application to the Australian Taxation Office (ATO)



Maintain regular updates with clients in each stage of the application process, including ATO approval, through various channels, including phone calls,
s, and SMS



Resolve all client inquiries and concerns with empathy, urgency, and professionalism



Uphold SuperCare policies and procedures while adhering to service level agreements (SLAs) with clients







THE PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS



At least 1 year of experience in a customer service role, preferably in a corporate setting within a service industry such as insurance and banking industries



Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with clients and colleagues



Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen attention to detail



Proficiency in using CRM and other relevant tools



Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities



A proactive approach to problem-solving and a strong commitment to delivering exceptional service while consistently ensuring compliance with all internal and external regulations



A client-first mindset with a strong sense of empathy and accountability







THE OFFER



Competitive compensation commensurate with experience



Opportunity for professional development and advancement within SuperCare



A dynamic and supportive work environment committed to an engaging Workforce Experience



Comprehensive training program





REQUIREMENTS:



Fast and reliable internet connection

Stable power supply with a backup power source, including UPS

Laptop/desktop requirements:

Dell is preferred (Inspiron Model)

2-year warranty

Intel Core i7 or Intel Core Ultra i7

16 GB RAM

500 GB SSD

Windows 11 Professional





HOW TO APPLY





If you are passionate about making a meaningful impact and thrive in a collaborative, innovative setting, we’d love to hear from you! Join us at SuperCare and be part of a team that is changing lives every single day. Apply now and take the next step in your career!

title: Amazon PPC acount manager
description:
Responsibilities and Domains of Agency:

Strategy

Document and publish the PPC strategy for anyone in the company to follow.

Do not rely upon reactive measures, follow the documented plan as results will be weighed against it

Defining the PPC goals to support the overall company's goals and the goals for each product

Transcribe the brand's goals into actionable PPC strategies.

Determining what actions outside of PPC must be taken in order for the PPC to succeed (ex. new product images, increasing review velocity, etc).

Revisiting and crafting strategy necessary to hit the PPC goals on a yearly, quarterly, monthly, and weekly basis.

Creating the plan of action and implementing the processes/workflows and tools necessary to execute any/all strategies developed.

Attending leadership meetings with the rest of the company to realign with priorities, update on PPC performance, and feedback data and information.

Management

Creating an organized and effective campaign structure.

Setting and managing bids.

Validating keyword research on each product that is generated from the Product Development team

Testing and monitoring different placements.

Overseeing all ad types including:

Sponsored Products

Sponsored Brands

Sponsored Display

Video Ads

Exploring new ad types as Amazon introduces them

Feeding back data from PPC to the rest of the company to help the company make better decisions.

Updating the company's internal SOP's relating to PPC.

Setting up and executing PPC launches

Launch

Work with the Product Development team to prepare and execute new product launches.

Work with the SKU Optimization team to re-launch or target specific keywords to improve overall performance of existing products.

The role is fully remote and admin focused, supporting live construction projects. The core purpose of the role is to keep project documentation accurate, organised, and submitted on time, while assisting the team with day to day project admin.

title: SNS Blog Administrator for Korean Company

Familiarity with Naver Blog/Cafe and HWP files.

[Salary & Growth]



Starting Salary: As this involves simple, repetitive tasks, we start with an entry-level rate.



Incentive: We offer a salary increase based on your work speed, formatting quality, and reliability after the initial probation period.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Social Media Manager For a Growing Creative Brand That Values Strategy







-About Us:



Monarca Media is a Utah-based, award-winning real estate media company.

We create high-end photo, video, and marketing content for real estate agents and home builders across the state.

Our visuals are strong, what we need help with is turning that content into consistent, intentional growth on social media.

This role is not about posting pretty photos and disappearing. It’s about understanding our brand, our audience, and how to move people from scrolling to engaging to trusting.







-This Role Is For You If:



You actually understand Instagram, not just the buttons

You know how to write captions that sound human, not AI-generated

You think about why content works, not just what to post

You care about consistency, tone and long-term brand growth

If you’re looking for a low-effort posting job, this is not the role.







-What You’ll Actually Be Doing:



Writing captions for reels, photos, and stories that feel natural and on-brand

Scheduling and managing Instagram content (we prioritize IG first)

Editing simple story content using CapCut or Canva

Engaging intentionally on Instagram (comments, replies, DMs, story interactions)

Reviewing content performance and making recommendations

Helping refine our content strategy over time, not guessing, but thinking





You will not be responsible for filming or heavy video editing - we take care of that on our side.





-What Matters Most to Us:



We care less about how many tools you list and more about:

How you think

How you communicate

Whether you can explain why you’d do something a certain way







- Required Skills:



Strong English writing (this role is caption-heavy)

Solid understanding of Instagram (Reels, Stories, engagement, pacing, tone)

Experience managing social media accounts (business or creator)

Comfortable with Canva and/or CapCut

Organized, reliable, and communicative







- Application Test (This Is Mandatory):



We are intentionally adding a test to see how you think. When you apply, you will be asked to complete and IG Account Review 
 



After reviewing our Instagram:



Tell us what you would do in the next 30 days to take it to the next level

 (No fluff. Be specific.)





- How to Apply:



Apply on here and then after use our form below:



  



Only applicants who complete the test will be considered.







- Why This Role Is Different:



This is a long-term position, not a short trial

You’ll work directly with the business owner

Your ideas will actually be implemented

We value quality and honesty





If you’re someone who takes pride in your work and likes building something real, we want to hear from you.



Applications that clearly feel AI-generated or copy-pasted will be disqualified. We’re looking for real people who think critically.

title: Commission Based Wordpress Developer
description:
Commission-Based WordPress Web Developer (Remote / Part-Time)



We’re looking for motivated WordPress web developers who want consistent project-based work and the opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling company.



This is a commission-based, per-project role, perfect for freelancers or part-time developers who want steady builds without client acquisition stress.



???? Role Overview



Build WordPress websites (typically 10 pages per site)



Projects are delivered using clear scope, content, and assets



Each site has a 15-day turnaround expectation



Sites are reviewed and paid upon project completion



More projects are assigned based on performance, quality, and reliability



???? Compensation



$100 USD per completed 10-page website



Additional pay for extra pages



Paid per project, not hourly



Reliable performers get more sites consistently



???? Growth Opportunity



Our company goal is to produce 30–50 websites per month, which means:



Ongoing work for strong performers



Ability to scale your monthly income based on output



Long-term opportunity for developers who prove consistency and quality



This is not a one-off gig — we’re building a long-term team.



? Requirements



Solid experience with WordPress



Comfortable building full websites (layout, pages, basic styling)



Able to meet deadlines and follow timelines



Good communication and responsiveness



Self-motivated and able to work independently



Portfolio or examples of previous WordPress work (required)



???? Ideal For



Freelancers looking for steady side income



Developers who prefer project-based pay



WordPress builders who work fast and clean



Anyone who wants more work based on performance, not favoritism



How to Apply



Please include:



A short introduction about yourself



Your WordPress experience



Links to previous WordPress websites you’ve built



Your availability per week



If you’re reliable, motivated, and want consistent projects without chasing clients... we want to hear from you.

title: Video Editor & YouTube Channel Manager (Paid Trial ? Long-Term Role)
description:
Video Editor & YouTube Channel Manager

(Paid Trial to Long-Term Role)



Company: Share Wealth Systems

Location: Remote

Engagement: Paid trial / gig with pathway to long-term role



About Share Wealth Systems:



Share Wealth Systems helps traders develop disciplined, rules-based approaches to the markets. Our long-form and educational video content plays a central role in how we teach, support, and guide our community, particularly through YouTube.



About the Role:



We’re looking for someone who can both execute and own our YouTube content over time.



This is not an editor-only role.



Early on, your primary focus will be hands-on video editing to help clear an existing backlog. As the backlog reduces, the role will gradually expand to include YouTube channel management, ensuring the channel is structured clearly and functions like a “video home website” for viewers.



If you’re only interested in editing and not channel ownership, this role will not be a fit.



What You’ll Be Responsible For:



Phase 1: Execution First

- Editing real backlog videos using Adobe Premiere Pro

- Producing consistent, high-quality edits aligned with our brand style

- Creating and integrating AI-generated video elements where appropriate (e.g., avatar-led segments, explainer clips, short-form derivatives)

- Delivering work reliably and iterating quickly based on feedback

- Working closely with the team to refine output and maintain consistency



Phase 2: Ongoing Execution + Channel Management

- Continued video editing and publishing

- Applying YouTube SEO best practices, including: titles and descriptions, basic keyword alignment, metadata optimization, consistency signals that support discovery

- Helping structure the YouTube home screen and overall channel flow

- Supporting long-term channel hygiene and content consistency

- Applying AI video tools strategically to improve efficiency and scale



Required Skills & Experience:

- Strong proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro (non-negotiable)

- Hands-on experience creating AI-generated videos, particularly using tools such as HeyGen (or comparable AI video platforms)

- Working knowledge of YouTube SEO fundamentals (titles, descriptions, metadata, structure)

- Solid video editing fundamentals (pacing, structure, clarity)

- Ability to work with pace and throughput (speed matters)

- Clear written and verbal communication

- Willingness to ask good questions and iterate based on feedback

- Sound judgment when working with real constraints



What We Value Most:

- Execution first, ego last

- Openness to feedback and learning

- Reliability and consistency

- Interest in growing into long-term channel ownership, not just delivering isolated edits



We care far more about how you work and think than generic strategy documents or polished interview answers.



Application Process:

As the first step, we’d like you to submit a short 3–5 minute video introduction. In your video, please answer the following:

- Tell us about yourself and your background.

- Why are you interested in working with Share Wealth Systems (Reference Share Wealth Systems on the video)?

- Share a brief note on your experience with YouTube channels (editing, management, or both).



Please upload your video to Google Drive, Dropbox, or use Loom and send us the relevant link here along with your resume. We’re looking for clear communication and a genuine introduction.

title: Paid Advertising Specialist - Google Ads Expert (Remote Contractor)
description:
Key Skills: Google Ads | Meta Ads  | Campaign Optimization | Marketing Automation | Analytics





This Contractor Role Is Perfect For:



Google Ads specialists managing $50K+/month budgets who want flexible project-based work

Agency PPC veterans seeking variable hours without employment commitment

Senior-level execution specialists who excel at optimization but don't want to own strategy

Multi-platform advertisers (Google/Meta/) comfortable with diverse B2C and B2B campaigns

Self-directed contractors who thrive with strategic direction but minimal oversight



What We Offer



Flexible remote work - work from anywhere, set your own hours

Professional team support - experienced strategists provide campaign direction; you execute with autonomy

Variable project flow - hours fluctuate with active campaigns (no guaranteed minimum)

About This Role

Responsibilities

Build and launch
/Instagram campaigns

Build

Create
 campaigns per strategic specifications

Platforms: GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Salesforce, Zoho, Mailchimp, Constant Contact





Collaboration:



Work closely with Digital Marketing Manager on campaign execution and reporting

Coordinate with Chief Marketing Strategist on strategic specifications and performance goals

Communicate proactively on campaign performance, issues, and optimization opportunities



Please send your application, including your portfolio and previous advertising campaigns, to: 



Dan Connor 

Marketing Director at ATG (Auction Technology Group) 

London, England, United Kingdom

title: Outreach & Appointment Setter
description:
I am a media agency founder based in Sacramento, California. We specialize in high-end, short-form cinematography for local brands. I am looking for a sharp, persistent Virtual Assistant to handle outreach and book appointments with local business owners.



The Goal: Your role is to connect with local businesses (Gyms, Real Estate, Restaurants, etc.) and get them to commit to a date and time for either a discovery call or a free demo shoot. You are the "front-of-house" for the agency—you find the leads and get them on my calendar.



Your Role:



Sourcing: Find local businesses in Sacramento and surrounding areas that need better social media content.



Outreach: Contact leads via Instagram,
, and Cold Calling.



Booking: Manage my calendar to schedule calls or on-site visits.



Hours & Pay:



Base Pay: $4.00 USD per hour.



Commission: CASH bonus for every "Show-up" (When the client actually attends the call or the shoot).



Schedule: Part-time to start (Must work during US PST business hours).



Requirements:



Excellent English: You must be confident and professional on the phone.



Persistent: You are a "hunter" who isn't afraid of cold outreach.



Organized: You can handle a lead list and a calendar without errors.



How to Apply (READ CAREFULLY):



Start your application with the keyword: CINEMA.



Send a link to a 60-second video of yourself talking. Upload this to Google Drive (ensure the link is set to "Anyone with the link"), Loom, or Dropbox.

Applications without the keyword "CINEMA" or the video link will be ignored.

title: Accountant (Multi-Entity)
description:
Role Purpose

To manage the daily accounting function across multiple TBD entities, ensuring invoices are processed, payments are collected, accounts are reconciled, and financial statements are prepared accurately and on time.

The Arrangement

This is a results-based engagement, not an hours-based one. The work needs to be completed each morning once Xero has updated overnight. As long as the work is done and I can see results, the exact timing within the morning window is flexible.

•Service window: 8:00am - 10:00am AEST (approximate)

•Flexibility within that window based on workload

•What matters: work is complete, accurate, and I can see the results

•No micromanagement of hours if outcomes are delivered



Primary Values



Highest Standards : Every figure is correct. Every reconciliation balances. Every statement is accurate. No sloppy work, no assumptions, no 'it's probably right'.



Ownership: You own the numbers. If something doesn't balance, you find out why. If a payment is missing, you chase it. You don't wait to be told there's a problem.



Deliver Results:  The work gets done every morning. Reports are ready when needed. Queries are resolved, not parked. Outcomes matter more than hours logged.





1 Accounts Receivable Generate and send all client invoices across multiple entities via Xero. Ensure accuracy of amounts, services, and client details. Chase overdue payments.

2 Accounts Payable Process supplier invoices, verify against purchase orders or approvals, schedule payments, and maintain accurate creditor records.

3 Debt Collection Actively chase outstanding debts. Request and follow up on statements. Resolve queries promptly. Escalate aged debt as per agreed thresholds.

4 Bank Reconciliation Reconcile all bank accounts daily once Xero updates. Identify and resolve discrepancies. No unmatched transactions left unaddressed.

5 Multi-Entity Management Manage accounts across Australian and UAE entities. Maintain clean separation between entities. Ensure intercompany transactions are properly recorded.

6 Statement Requests Request statements from suppliers and debtors as needed. Confirm balances. Identify and resolve any discrepancies between records.

7 Query Resolution Respond to and resolve queries from clients, suppliers, and internal stakeholders. Don't let queries sit. Own them until resolved.

8 Financial Statements Prepare monthly Profit & Loss and Balance Sheet for each entity. Ensure statements are accurate, complete, and delivered by agreed deadlines.

9 Month-End Close Complete month-end close procedures. Ensure all transactions are posted, accruals are recorded, and accounts are ready for reporting.



Requirements

Essential

•Strong Xero experience (this is non-negotiable)

•Experience managing accounts for multiple entities

•Ability to prepare financial statements (P&L, Balance Sheet)

•Experience with accounts receivable, accounts payable, and bank reconciliation

•Comfortable chasing payments and resolving queries professionally

•Reliable internet and quiet workspace

•Available within the 8:00am - 10:00am AEST service window

Desirable

•Accounting qualification (CPA, CA, or equivalent)

•Experience with Australian accounting standards (UAE experience a plus)

•Experience in a services or professional services business

What Success Looks Like

•Bank accounts reconciled daily, no unexplained items

•Invoices sent on time and accurately

•Debts chased proactively, not aged silently

•Queries resolved, not parked

•Financial statements ready when needed, accurate and complete

•I can see results each morning without having to ask

•Problems flagged early, not discovered later

The Non-Negotiables

•Accuracy is everything. If you're not sure, check. If you can't check, ask.

•Don't let things age silently. If a debt is overdue, chase it. If a query is unresolved, resolve it.

•Own your numbers. If something doesn't balance, it's your job to find out why.

•Communicate proactively. If there's a problem, I should hear it from you first.

•Results matter more than hours. Get the work done right, and the flexibility works both ways.

title: Amazon Private Label and PPC Specialist
description:
About the role

We are an Australian owned business with a UK based private label brand on Amazon.

You will be managing a UK marketplace private label brand for an Australian client.

We are looking for an experienced Amazon specialist in the Philippines to manage our advertising campaigns, support A plus content, and stay on top of performance every week. You will work closely with our creative team to brief and improve images and video so the brand stays competitive and profitable.



Key responsibilities

1. Campaign and ad management

Set up, manage, and optimise Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display campaigns.

Monitor Amazon Ads and Ad Console several times per week within your agreed hours.

Adjust bids, budgets, and targeting to reach ACOS and TACOS targets.

Manage keyword research, search term reports, and negative keywords.

Run regular tests on creatives, headlines, and placements.

2. Private label brand management

Work only on our private label listings, not arbitrage or wholesale.

Review competitor listings, pricing, and offers on the UK marketplace.

Suggest changes to offers, pricing, and promotions based on data.

Coordinate with the team on review strategy and listing quality.

3. A plus content and listings

Review current listings and A plus content for clarity, keyword coverage, and conversion.

Brief the creative team on images, infographics, comparison charts, and brand story modules.

Check uploads on Amazon once the creative team delivers the assets.

Suggest ongoing improvements based on performance data.

4. Creative and video ads

Plan what image and video assets are needed for ads and product detail pages.

Provide clear briefs to designers and video editors with examples and references.

Review final assets before upload and confirm they meet Amazon guidelines.

Monitor performance of video ads and propose changes when needed.

5. Reporting and optimisation

Prepare a short weekly performance summary with key numbers, including ACOS, TACOS, ad spend, sales, best and worst performers, and search terms.

Flag any issues early, including sudden drops in performance or policy warnings.

Keep simple dashboards or spreadsheets up to date.



Skills and experience

Strong experience managing Amazon Ads for private label brands, with at least one year of hands on experience in Amazon PPC and Ad Console.

Confident in managing Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display.

Confident in keyword research and search term analysis.

Experience with bid and budget optimisation and negative keyword strategy.

Good understanding of listing optimisation, including titles, bullet points, images, and A plus content.

Experience working with a creative team and giving clear, structured briefs.

Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills for basic reports and analysis.

Experience with tools such as Helium 10, Jungle Scout, Data Dive, or similar.

Strong English reading and writing skills, with a focus on UK marketplace wording.

Personal qualities

Proactive and organised, always aware of campaign performance.

Detail focused, especially with numbers, bids, and budgets.

Comfortable working independently with light supervision.

Clear and direct communicator, able to explain needs and findings to the creative and leadership team.

Strong sense of ownership for results and ad spend.



Hours and working pattern

Approximately 3 to 5 hours per week to start.

Flexible schedule, as long as agreed weekly tasks and reporting are completed on time.

Potential for more hours as the brand grows and results improve.

Benefits

Work from home, long term role for the right person.

Stable client based in Australia with growth plans in the UK marketplace.

Opportunity to grow hours and responsibilities over time.

title: Web Visibility and SEO Operations Specialist (GoHighLevel and WordPress)
description:
Location :  Philippines remote

Some overlap with Australia and UK time zones as needed



Team and reporting

 Part of the Online and Creative Team

Role purpose

 Own search visibility and website operations.

 You will ensure our websites are crawled, indexed, and presented correctly across Google, Bing, and AI driven search experiences.

 You will manage the technical foundations behind visibility: sitemaps, metadata, structured data, site architecture, redirects, indexing controls, and tracking.

 You will also tell the team what content inputs you xing

 Maintain XML sitemaps, robots rules, canonical tags, redirectneed from blogs and video so our site stays current and trusted.

Key responsibilities

 Search visibility operations

 Manage Google Search Console and fix indexing and crawl issues

 Set up and manage Bing Webmaster Tools and monitor indes, and noindex rules

 Improve site structure and internal linking to support crawling and rankings

 Identify and remove duplicate or thin pages from indexing pathways



AI search readiness

 Structure pages so AI tools extract accurate answers

 Implement structured data such as Organisation, LocalBusiness, Service, FAQ, Article, Breadcrumb

 Maintain and improve Source of Truth pages and keep them current

 Monitor how our content appears in AI results and recommend improvements











GoHighLevel build and optimisation

 Build and maintain pages in GoHighLevel including service pages, landing pages, and funnels

 Set page level SEO fields including titles, descriptions, and indexing settings

 Ensure mobile responsiveness and clean user experience

 Support conversion tracking for key forms and funnels



WordPress support

 Maintain WordPress sites as required including updates, backups, plugins, and troubleshooting

 Implement SEO improvements inside WordPress when directed

Google Business and Google Workspace

 Support Google Business Profile optimisation and consistency of business information

 Support Google Workspace fundamentals including domain and
 setup basics such as SPF, DKIM, DMARC

Tracking and reporting

 Maintain analytics and tracking across websites and funnels

 Send a weekly update to CEO covering:

 What changed

 What broke or is at risk

 What improved

 Your recommendations and next priorities

title: Graphic Designer
description:
We are looking for a Graphic Designer to support several of our companies with online graphics and other creative work. Our team consists of amazing professionals, and this role is the missing piece we’re excited to add.



The Graphic Designer's responsibilities include the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing, and creating graphics—including illustrations, logos, layouts, and photos. You’ll be the one to shape the visual aspects of websites, books, magazines, product packaging, exhibitions, and more.



Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the intended message. You must have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design. If you can communicate well and work methodically as part of a team, we’d love to meet you.



Goal: To inspire and attract the target audience through impactful visual design.











Responsibilities

Study design briefs and determine requirements

Conceptualize visuals based on requirements

Prepare rough drafts and present ideas

Develop illustrations, logos, and other designs using software or by hand

Use appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic

Work with copywriters and the creative director to produce final designs

Test graphics across various media

Amend designs based on feedback

Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing and on-brand





Requirements and Skills

Proven graphic design experience

A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphic work

Familiarity with design software and technologies (e.g., InDesign, Illustrator, Dreamweaver, Photoshop)

A keen eye for aesthetics and detail

Excellent communication skills

Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines

A degree in Design, Fine Arts, or a related field is a plus

title: Sales Rep / Conversion / Outbound Caller
description:
The Role We are looking for a high-energy, persuasive, and highly organised individual to join our team. This role combines "warm" lead conversion with essential administrative support. You will call individuals who have expressed interest in the charity, persuade them to fundraise or donate, and then confidently manage the backend data and administration that follows.

Outbound Calling: Contact warm leads immediately to capitalise on their interest.



Lead Conversion: Call ad-generated leads to secure funding and inspire long-term support.



Confident Administration: Manage the full "supporter journey" including sending follow-up
s.



CRM Management: Take full ownership of data entry; you must be confident navigating and updating CRM systems to ensure no lead is forgotten.



Reporting: Regularly compile short reports on call outcomes, conversion rates, and donor feedback for the management team.



What We’re Looking For



Cultural Fluency: Deep knowledge of Muslim faith and culture (Zakat, Sadaqah, etc.) is essential.



Admin Confidence: You should be someone who "loves a spreadsheet" and takes pride in a clean, organised database. You don't wait to be told to file a document; you do it instinctively.



Communication: 



Must be confident in speaking English



A professional telephone manner and the ability to write clear, error-free follow-up
s.



This will be starting as a zero-hour contract to ensure you are a right fit.



NOTE: Must be a muslim!

title: Digital Marketing Manager – Paid Media, Email & Strategic Partnerships
description:
The ideal candidate is data-savvy, hands-on with digital ad platforms, experienced in marketing automation, and thrives in fast-paced, collaborative environments. You’ll own and optimize digital advertising efforts (Meta, Google, LinkedIn) along with the digital marketing agency, develop automated
 workflows (HubSpot or similar), and build performance-based partnerships to expand our reach across both B2B and B2C audiences.



Key Responsibilities



1. Paid Digital Media & Campaign Management



Plan, execute, and continuously optimize digital advertising campaigns across Meta 
/Instagram), Google Ads (Search/Display/YouTube), and LinkedIn Ads.

Align paid strategies with overall business and revenue goals across both B2B and B2C segments.

Manage creative testing, audience targeting, budget pacing, and ongoing performance analysis.

2. Agency & Vendor Management



Lead communication and coordination with external digital and creative agencies, ensuring alignment on campaign strategies, timelines, and KPIs.

Oversee asset development and ensure brand consistency across all digital executions.

Manage relationships with digital media platforms, vendors, and service providers to drive performance and ROI.

3.
 Marketing Strategy & Execution



Build and manage automated, segmented
 marketing campaigns that engage prospects and customers throughout the funnel.

Drive growth via newsletters, nurture campaigns, product launches, and retention workflows.

Use platforms like HubSpot and Mailchimp to build, automate, and optimize campaigns.

Implement A/B testing, monitor deliverability, and report on
 performance metrics.

4. Strategic Partnership Development



Develop and manage affiliate, referral, influencer, and co-marketing partnerships to expand digital presence and lead generation.

Work closely with Sales, Product, and Brand teams to align campaigns and partnership objectives.

Track partner performance and ROI through joint campaign initiatives.

5. Digital Analytics & Reporting



Track, analyze, and report on KPIs including ROAS, CAC, CPL, CVR, LTV, and attribution metrics.

Use tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, and CRM dashboards to derive actionable insights.

Collaborate on dashboard configuration to support ongoing campaign optimization.

6. Cross-Functional Integration



Collaborate with Creative, Content, Social Media, Web, and Events teams to align messaging, asset development, and campaign timelines.

Contribute to broader strategic planning and the marketing calendar.

Required Qualifications



Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, or related field.

3+ years of experience in marketing or advertising roles, including at least 2 years in digital marketing, including paid media execution and partner management.

Strong track record managing external agencies or vendors and delivering measurable campaign results.

Fluency in digital ad platforms (Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, LinkedIn Ads) and analytics tools (Google Analytics, third-party dashboard tools).



Hands-on experience with
 marketing platforms, especially HubSpot or similar.

Strong communication skills and the ability to present performance insights to stakeholders.

Highly organized with a results-driven mindset and attention to detail.



Please send your application, including your portfolio and previous advertising campaigns, to: 



Dan Connor 

Marketing Director at ATG (Auction Technology Group) 

London, England, United Kingdom

title: Financial Operations Specialist
description:
IMPORTANT => Apply by going to careers.ac



WARNING: If you use AI slob to apply, expect to not hear back from us

using AI is great and you will during your job, but we want to hear from you. not chatgpt.



----

What To Expect



We are a fast-moving startup in the cold
 infrastructure space – we innovate quickly and scale with a steep trajectory. We're hiring a Financial Operations Specialist to help our leadership team maintain a holistic and accurate overview of finances at each stage of our growth.



You'll own our financial documentation and have oversight over supplier payments and service delivery. This means ensuring every transaction is properly documented, payments are made correctly and on time, and every service we pay for is delivered as promised.



You don't need to know cold
 yet.



You do need sharp attention to detail, a proactive mindset, and the ability to thrive in a fast-moving startup environment.



This role starts full-time to help us catch up and establish solid processes. As we stabilize, hours may flex down to 16–20 per week – then scale back up as the company grows in complexity.



If you're hungry to grow, this role has a clear path: from clean books to financial strategy – analyzing unit economics, modeling growth scenarios, and advising leadership on financial decisions with 1x in, 67x out impact.



---

What You'll Do



- Own Financial Documentation – Ensure all income and expenses have relevant documentation. Every inflow, every outflow – accounted for and audit-ready.

- Oversee Supplier Payments & Delivery – Ensure obligations are paid on time and correctly, and that services are delivered as described.

- Build Financial Foundations – Help establish the processes and systems that will scale with us as the company grows.

- Grow With Us – As complexity increases, so will your responsibilities. This role expands alongside the business.



---

What You'll Bring



- Experience working in startups – you understand the pace, the ambiguity, and the ownership required

- Strong attention to detail – nothing slips through the cracks

- Proactive communication – you follow up, you clarify, you close loops

- Comfort with flexible arrangements – full-time initially, with hours that adapt to business needs

- Knowledge of Hong Kong company requirements is appreciated, but not required



---

What Success Looks Like



- Every transaction – inflow and outflow – has proper documentation. No gaps, no guesswork.

- Suppliers are paid correctly and on time.

- Services we pay for are delivered as promised – you catch discrepancies before they become problems.

- Financial processes are clean, scalable, and ready for growth.

- You bring order to the chaos that comes with fast growth – and you do it with ownership, not just compliance.



---

Why You'll Want to Join Us



- 100% Remote: Work from anywhere

- Flexible Hours: Full-time to start, then 16–40 hours depending on needs – a role that adapts

- Flat Hierarchy: Direct access to founders

- Career Growth: From documentation to unit economics, financial modeling, and strategic recommendations – a path you'd wait years for elsewhere

- Real Impact: You'll shape the financial foundation of a company building the future of cold
 infrastructure



---

Ready to join us?



We're not looking for someone to just process transactions.



We're looking for someone who wants to own the financial clarity of a growing company – someone who brings order, catches problems early, and builds systems that scale.



If you're detail-oriented, startup-tested, and want a role that grows with you, this is for you.



Apply now.



-----

IMPORTANT => Apply by going to careers.ac



WARNING: If you use AI slob to apply, expect to not hear back from us

using AI is great and you will during your job, but we want to hear from you. not chatgpt.

title: Social Media Manager/Engagement
description:
I’m hiring a part time engagement copywriter for LinkedIn and Instagram.

You’ll write comments, replies, and some DM's in my voice.

The goal is simple. Keep daily conversations active, thoughtful, and on brand.



What I need from you:

You’re a strong copywriter.

You can mirror someone’s style quickly and accurately.

You write with confidence and clarity.

You move fast.

You show up consistently.



The schedule is fixed:

You’ll work 2 to 3 hours every day.

You’ll start at 7:30AM ET.

(if you cannot work every day, please indicate, but this means you'll have to share the hours with someone else to create a backup system)



AI is part of the workflow: I’ll give you a specific engagement GPT to speed things up and make work easier.

But your brain still has to be on, no generic AI sounding replies.



You also need good social instincts.

You can spot what’s trending in our topics.

You know what comments will land and what will fall flat.

You can switch tone depending on whether it’s LinkedIn or Instagram.



Pay is $2 to $3 per hour.

Your rate depends on writing quality and speed. We will start on the low range and work up the range as needed.



If you need heavy editing or you work too slowly, it won’t be a fit.



Because you’ll see sensitive information, trust matters. You’ll sign an NDA. You’ll also provide basic ID verification documents.



How to apply.

- Send a 60-90 second video: Share who you are and your copywriting experience. Tell me why you’re a fit for this role. Tell me how you match a creator’s voice without sounding templated.

- Confirm you can work daily in the time window above.

- Share 2 sample comments for this post from someone considered a mindfulness & positive psychology expert:


 



If you cannot connect daily, say it upfront.

If you need off days, tell me which days.

I’m open to an alternating schedule as long as coverage is guaranteed.



This is a big account.

You’ll be writing for an audience of 25k+ followers.

Work is across both LinkedIn and Instagram.

title: Brand & Social Media Marketing Manager (Remote / WFH)
description:
Brand & Social Media Marketing Manager 



This is a paid social + brand role: performance is the priority, but the work also requires strong creative judgment, an understanding of brand voice, and the ability to translate insights into smarter messaging and better customer-facing campaigns.



You’ll manage multiple campaigns at once, identify what creative is working, brief new creative quickly, and report results back in a way that helps our team make faster, sharper marketing decisions across the platform.

This is not a “post and plan” role. It’s for someone who can own outcomes, move fast with autonomy, and help elevate both performance and brand presence at the same time. And also be willing to jump in on other areas of brand marketing as well.



What You'll Do

Paid Meta Campaign Management (Primary Focus)

Own paid social execution across multiple brands running simultaneously

Build, launch, and optimize Meta campaigns 
 + Instagram) with minimal oversight

Monitor budgets, performance trends, and lead flow daily

Creative Performance + Briefing

Write clear creative briefs and partner closely with our designers to produce new ads fast

Continuously iterate based on performance data, not opinions

Reporting + Insights

Track and report on key metrics (CPL, ROAS, conversion rates, lead quality)

Multi-Brand Execution + Organization

What We're Looking For

Proven experience managing agencies and creative partners.

Strong project management and organizational skills with the ability to juggle multiple deadlines.

Analytical mindset with a passion for tracking performance metrics and optimizing campaigns and pivot when needed.

-Optimize checkout, site speed, and conversion flow

-Implement basic SEO, analytics, and tracking (GA4, Meta Pixel)

-QA testing and deployment



Required Skills & Experience:

-Proven Shopify development experience (Shopify Admin, Shopify Flow)

-Strong knowledge of Liquid templating language

-Experience with automation tools and API-based integrations

-Familiarity with ecommerce best practices and CRO

-Ability to deliver a scalable, production-ready Shopify store



Requirements:

-Experience: 4-5 years plus experience as Shopify Expert

-Must be able to work US time zone (graveyard shift)

title: Multilingual SEO Localization Specialist + WordPress
description:
This is NOT a literal translation job.

We need someone who can take German blog posts and create three separate, rank-ready SEO versions (EN/FR/ES). That includes keyword localization, intent matching, rewriting/adapting sections, and publishing in WordPress with WPML + Rank Math.



This role is NOT for you if:



-You only translate text word-for-word



-You don’t know how to choose a primary keyword per language



-You can’t confidently work inside WordPress (formatting, layout issues, mobile issues)



-You haven’t used WPML + Rank Math before





For each blog post, deliver per language (EN/FR/ES):



-Localized primary keyword + 3–8 secondary keywords (based on intent)



-SEO-optimized Title tag, Meta description, URL slug



-Updated headings (H1–H3) and rewritten sections when needed



-Unique ALT texts for images (not auto-translated)



-5–10 language-specific high-authority external links



-Publish + format in WordPress and connect translations via WPML



-Complete Rank Math fields per language





WordPress technical responsibilities:



-Fix formatting/layout breaks (desktop + mobile)



-Troubleshoot broken buttons, spacing, responsiveness, page builder issues



-Handle basic HTML/CSS edits when needed



-Work with WP Rocket cache/performance basics (clear cache, diagnose conflicts)

title: Commercial Roofing Estimator / Estimate Writer
description:
About the Role



We are hiring an experienced Commercial Roofing Estimator / Estimate Writer with 2+ years of commercial roofing estimating experience (more is preferred).

This is a critical role that supports our Sales and Project Management teams by preparing accurate, detailed, and professional estimates for commercial roofing projects.



You must have hands-on experience estimating commercial roof systems, not just residential. Applicants without commercial roofing estimating experience will not be considered.



Key Responsibilities



* Prepare accurate commercial roofing estimates based on inspection notes, videos, takeoffs, and project details

* Identify appropriate materials, labor requirements, and system components for each project

* Produce professional, client-ready proposals using our templates

* Break down scopes clearly (materials, labor, warranties, options)

* Conduct roof takeoff reviews and verify quantities

* Track estimate versions and revisions

* Communicate with the team when information is missing or unclear

* Deliver estimates within required timelines

* Maintain accuracy, clarity, and consistency on all bids



Required Qualifications



? 2+ years (or more) of commercial roofing estimating experience

? Ability to provide real samples of past estimates you created

? Strong knowledge of commercial roofing systems:

?• TPO / PVC

?• EPDM

?• Torch down

?• Coatings

?• Metal systems

? Understanding of U.S. roofing materials and terminology

? Excellent written and spoken English

? High accuracy with measurements, takeoffs, and pricing breakdowns

? Ability to follow detailed scope templates and brand standards

? Strong attention to detail and consistency



Preferred (Not Required)



* Experience with JobNimbus

* Experience with other roofing CRMs or estimating tools

* Experience with EagleView, CompanyCam, RoofSnap, or similar platforms

* Residential roofing estimating experience

* Familiarity with Washington State roofing practices (training provided)



What We’re Looking For



* Someone reliable, detail-oriented, and accurate

* Someone who communicates clearly and professionally

* Someone who meets deadlines and works efficiently

* Someone who wants a long-term role with growth opportunities

* Someone who can work U.S. daytime or mid-shift hours



Applicants without commercial roofing estimating experience will not be considered.

title: Data Entry Specialist
description:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant (Outreach, Admin & Socials)

Location: Remote Job Type: Part-Time / Contract



Role Overview I am looking for a proactive Virtual Assistant to handle three core areas: direct outreach (DMing) to potential clients and recruiters, managing job applications, and keeping social media accounts active. You will be provided with scripts and templates, but you must be comfortable managing an inbox and sending high volumes of messages daily.



Core Responsibilities



1. Outreach & Direct Messaging (Primary Focus)



Client Prospecting: Send cold DMs to restaurants and hospitality businesses on Instagram/Facebook using provided scripts to pitch marketing services.



Recruiter Networking: Send connection requests and follow-up messages to hiring managers and recruiters in the finance sector on LinkedIn.



Inbox Management: Monitor replies, flag positive responses for my review, and follow up on unread messages after 3 days.



Tracking: Log every DM sent and the response status in a Google Sheet/CRM.



2. Job Application Management



Apply: Submit daily applications for entry-level finance and analyst roles.



Tailor: Adjust cover letters based on the company name and specific role requirements.



Organize: Keep a strict log of applied jobs to avoid duplicates.



3. Social Media Maintenance



Scheduling: Upload and schedule daily posts (photos/videos) for restaurant marketing content.



Engagement: Interact with target accounts (liking/commenting on local food blogger or restaurant posts) to increase visibility before sending DMs.



Requirements



Confidence in Outreach: You must be comfortable sending "cold" messages and adhering to daily volume targets (e.g., 20 DMs/day).



Organization: Ability to track hundreds of conversations without letting details slip through the cracks.



Platform Proficiency: Experienced with Instagram DMs, LinkedIn messaging, and
.



Fast Response Time: Ability to alert me quickly if a high-value prospect responds.



To Apply Please submit your resume and answer the following:



Have you done cold outreach or lead generation before?



Are you comfortable using a tracker (like Google Sheets) to log message status?

title: DevOps / Cloud Infrastructure Engineer (AWS, WordPress, Node.js)
description:
About the Role 

 

We are a technology and marketing company supporting multiple production systems, including Node.js applications, serverless AWS services, and WordPress platforms. We are looking for an experienced DevOps / Cloud Infrastructure Engineer to help manage, maintain, and support our cloud and hosting environments. 

 

This role is focused on execution, reliability, and operational excellence, working alongside senior engineers who define overall architecture and security strategy. 

 

Key Responsibilities 

Cloud & Infrastructure Support 

 • Manage and maintain AWS environments used for: 

 • Node.js applications 

 • AWS Lambda functions 

 • Databases, storage, and supporting services 

 • Assist with: 

 • EC2 provisioning and maintenance 

 • IAM users and access (following established policies) 

 • Backups, monitoring, and basic scaling tasks 

 • Follow documented infrastructure and security standards. 

 

WordPress & Hosting 

 • Maintain and support WordPress websites in production. 

 • Perform: 

 • Core, theme, and plugin updates 

 • Backups and restores 

 • Performance and uptime monitoring 

 • Work with SiteGround hosting, including: 

 • Site setup and migrations 

 • DNS configuration and SSL certificates 

 • Caching and hosting-level optimizations 

 • Troubleshoot WordPress-related issues efficiently. 

 

Deployments & Automation 

 • Support deployments for: 

 • Node.js applications 

 • PHP / WordPress sites 

 • Maintain and follow CI/CD pipelines and deployment processes. 

 • Assist with automation scripts and environment consistency. 

 

Monitoring & I
 Support 

 • Monitor logs, alerts, and system health. 

 • Respond to infrastructure and hosting i
. 

 • Escalate issues appropriately and assist with post-i
 reviews. 

 • Help maintain documentation, runbooks, and operational procedures. 



Required Experience & Skills 

 

Required 

 • 3+ years of experience in a DevOps, Cloud, or Hosting-focused role 

 • Hands-on experience with AWS in production environments 

 • Strong experience supporting WordPress websites 

 • Practical experience with SiteGround hosting 

 • Linux server administration experience 

 • Experience deploying or supporting Node.js applications 

 • Familiarity with CI/CD concepts and deployment workflows 

 • Understanding of basic cloud security best practices 

 • Strong English communication skills (written and spoken) 

 • Ability to follow defined processes and escalate risks early 

 

Nice to Have 

 • Experience with AWS Lambda 

 • Familiarity with PHP and JavaScript 

 • Experience working with international or distributed teams 

 • Basic scripting (Bash, etc.) 

 • Exposure to infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform, CloudFormation) 

 

What This Role Is (and Is Not) 

 

This role IS: 

 • Execution-focused and operational 

 • Responsible for uptime, stability, and support 

 • WordPress and hosting-heavy 

 • Collaborative with senior engineers and leadership 

 

This role is NOT: 

 • A junior or entry-level position 

 • Sole owner of AWS architecture or security strategy 

 • A purely helpdesk or ticket-only role 

 

We value experience, reliability, clear communication, and attention to detail. 

 

How to Apply (Important) 

 

Please include the following in your application: 

 1. A brief summary of your DevOps or hosting experience 

 2. Your experience with AWS (services you’ve used hands-on) 

 3. Your experience with WordPress and SiteGround 

 4. An example of a production issue you’ve handled and how you resolved it 

 5. Confirmation that you have at least 3 years of relevant experience 

 

Applications that do not include all requested information will not be reviewed. 

 

What Success Looks Like 

 • Stable and well-maintained infrastructure 

 • Fewer hosting-related i
 

 • Clear, timely communication during issues 

 • Clean documentation and repeatable processes 

 • Strong operational support for development teams
salary: To be discuss based on experience

s

 sequences that feel human and convert

title: We’re Hiring: Video Editior & Social Media Creatives
description:
We’re looking to bring on a skilled, professional video editor to help grow and manage our social media presence across multiple platforms.



We currently have:

88K followers on Instagram (primary account)

2 additional Instagram accounts in the same industry that require continued growth

A new TikTok page we’re actively scaling

An expanding YouTube channel tied to a new barber competition series

This role is focused on producing high-quality video content that supports a consistent posting schedule while helping us expand our audience and strengthen our brand presence.



What You’ll Be Doing

Editing short-form and long-form video content for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube

Helping maintain a consistent publishing cadence across all platforms

Working with existing brand assets, products, and raw footage

Optimizing videos for each platform’s format and audience behavior

Incorporating captions, pacing, sound, and visual elements to maximize engagement

Supporting campaigns, launches, and ongoing content series

Bringing creative ideas that elevate the overall quality of our content



What We’re Looking For

Proven experience editing social-first video content

Strong creative instincts with the ability to think outside the box

Comfortable using CapCut and modern editing platforms

Familiarity with the latest AI tools that improve workflow and output

Comfortable operating within a structured content system

An extensive library of brand assets and products

Ongoing content opportunities

Consistent work and consistent pay

Long-term opportunity for the right fit

How to Apply

If you’re interested, please reach out with:

A brief note on your experience, tools you use, and availability

Only applicants with portfolios will be considered.

title: Amazon PPC Campaign Manager 2+ Years of Experience (Attach Work References)
description:
Job Overview



We are seeking a results-driven Amazon PPC Campaign Manager to plan, execute, and optimize paid advertising campaigns within the Amazon marketplace. This role is responsible for improving product visibility, increasing sales, and maximizing return on ad spend (ROAS) through data-driven strategy and continuous optimization of Sponsored Ads and DSP campaigns.



Key Responsibilities

Campaign Strategy & Execution



Create, launch, and manage Amazon advertising campaigns including:



Sponsored Products



Sponsored Brands



Sponsored Display



Amazon DSP (preferred but optional)



Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and audience targeting.



Structure campaigns for scalability, testing, and performance tracking.



Optimization & Performance Management



Monitor and optimize bids, budgets, placements, and targeting.



Reduce ACoS and improve TACoS while maintaining sales growth.



Implement negative keywords and refine search term harvesting.



Run A/B tests on creatives, headlines, and targeting strategies.



Analytics & Reporting



Track KPIs such as:



ACoS / TACoS



ROAS



Conversion rate



Click-through rate (CTR)



Cost per click (CPC)



Produce weekly and monthly performance reports with actionable insights.



Use tools such as Helium 10, Jungle Scout, Data Dive, or Amazon Ads Console for analysis.



Collaboration



Work with listing optimization, creative, and inventory teams to align PPC strategy.



Provide recommendations on pricing, promotions, and keyword indexing.



Communicate campaign performance and strategy to stakeholders or clients.



Required Qualifications



1–3+ years of hands-on Amazon PPC management experience.



Strong understanding of Amazon Seller Central and Ads Console.



Proven track record of improving ACoS/ROAS and scaling campaigns profitably.



Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets for data analysis.



Analytical mindset with strong attention to detail.



Preferred Qualifications



Experience managing $10K+ monthly ad spend.



Familiarity with Amazon DSP and external traffic strategies.



Knowledge of keyword research and listing SEO for Amazon.



Experience working with agencies, brands, or multiple ASIN portfolios.



Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)



Reduced ACoS and improved TACoS



Increased ROAS and total sales



Efficient budget utilization



Consistent campaign growth and scalability



Compensation



Competitive salary or hourly rate based on experience.



Performance bonuses tied to ROAS, revenue growth, or efficiency metrics.



Flexible remote work options (if applicable).



Why Join Us



Opportunity to work with growing Amazon brands.



Data-driven, performance-focused environment.



Clear impact on revenue and brand visibility.
